details: The camp was well-organized, and the staff was friendly. The screenings were thorough, though the waiting time was longer than expected. It would be great if they improved the waiting area. Overall, I gained valuable health insights.

I took my daughter to the vaccination camp, and it was very efficient. The staff explained each vaccination clearly. The only suggestion is more volunteers for crowd control. Overall, a great experience.
The diabetes screening was very informative, and the staff was friendly. However, the follow-up process could have been clearer. Still, the camp was helpful in raising awareness about diabetes.
I had a great experience at the eye care camp. The exam was thorough, and I received free glasses. The waiting time was a bit long, but it was worth it. Would recommend it!
The blood donation camp was well-organized, and I felt comfortable donating. There could have been more seating and snacks afterward, but overall, it was a positive experience.
The mental health camp was very supportive, and the counselors created a safe space. I wish it had been better promoted to reach more people, but it was an important and helpful event.
